house_listing.house_description: This 2 level single family home built in 1929 has 6 bedroom(s), 6 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) . Rooms include dining room, family room, master bedroom. Features include private pool, fireplace, air conditioning.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Dining Room, Family Room, Master Bedroom

house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Dishwasher, Guest House, Microwave, Office,Tudor Style
